hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started with Conversa.
hero.intro: Welcome to our FAQ center. Here you’ll find clear answers to the most common questions about using Conversa. If you can’t find your answer, feel free to contact us.

qna.what_is_conversa_a: Conversa is a platform to practice languages in a playful way, in small groups, in partner bars and cafés in Brussels. No lectures: we talk, play and exchange like with friends, while meeting new people.
qna.how_join_event_a: From the homepage, choose a language you like, explore available sessions and click “Join”. Once on site, confirm your attendance via the app and join the group to start playing.
qna.cancel_policy_a: Yes, as long as the event hasn’t started. You can cancel directly from the app. This frees up your spot for someone else and keeps groups dynamic.
qna.account_data_q: What do you do with my data?
qna.account_data_a: We only collect the information needed to organize sessions and ensure participant safety. Your data is never sold, and you can update or request deletion at any time.
qna.payment_price_a: The standard ticket is €7 per session, which includes access to the conversation game and meeting other participants. Some special events or workshops may have different prices, always shown in advance.
